block.simpleportals.portal.name: Portal
item.simpleportals.portal_activator.tool: Use on the inner face of
commands.tpd.info: Teleports a player either to another player or to a position. Works across dimensions.
commands.tpd.success: Teleported '%s' to 'x=%d, y=%d, z=%d' in dimension '%s'.
commands.sportals.clear.info: Completely clears the portal registry, without deactivating any portals. Use with CAUTION.
commands.sportals.list.info: Generates a list of all portals matching the supplied filter criteria. The list contains dimension, position, power and address for each portal.
commands.sportals.list.success: Successfully requested portal list. Output diverted to log.
commands.sportals.deactivate.info: Removes portals from the portal network and deactivates them.
commands.sportals.deactivate.success: Deactivated portal at 'x=%d, y=%d, z=%d' in dimension '%s'.
commands.sportals.power.info: Manages the internal power of portals.
commands.sportals.power.add.success: Added '%d' power to the portal at 'x=%d, y=%d, z=%d' in dimension '%s'.
commands.sportals.power.remove.success: Removed '%d' power from the portal at 'x=%d, y=%d, z=%d' in dimension '%s'.
commands.sportals.power.get.success: The portal at 'x=%d, y=%d, z=%d' in dimension '%s' has '%d' energy stored.
commands.sportals.power.items.success: Valid items to power portals are ('%d' total):
commands.sportals.cooldown.info: Queries the teleportation cooldown of a player. Portals can only be used once the cooldown reaches 0.
commands.sportals.cooldown.success: Cooldown for player '%s' is currently '%d' ticks (~%.2f sec).
commands.errors.missing_dimension: Dimension '%d' appears to be missing. Removing registry entries only.
commands.errors.unknown_sender: The command sender was not a player.
commands.errors.unknown_sender_dimension: No dimension was specified and the command senders dimension could not be determined.
commands.errors.portal_not_found_with_ad: No portals with the address '%s' could be found.
No portals with the address '%s' could be found in dimension '%s'.
commands.errors.portal_not_found_at_pos_: No portals could be found at 'x=%d, y=%d, z=%d' in dimension '%s'.
commands.errors.multiple_portals_found_a: Multiple portals were found at 'x=%d, y=%d, z=%d' in dimension '%s'. Use the coordinates of a block that is only part of one portal.
commands.errors.no_power_items: No valid items found for item tag '%s'. Check your config.
config.input_valid:
Value is valid.
(Press to reset to default)
config.input_invalid:
Value is invalid and will not be saved!
(Press to reset to default)
config.needs_world_restart: Changing this value requires a restart to take effect!
config.max_size.tooltip: The maximum size of the portal including the frame.
config.power_cost.tooltip: The power cost per use of a portal. Set to 0 for no cost.
config.power_capacity.tooltip: The amount of power a portal can store.
config.player_teleportation_delay.toolti: The delay in ticks before a player actually gets teleported. Needs to be lower than the cooldown.
config.player_teleportation_cooldown.too: Cooldown in ticks before a player can be teleported again by a portal.
config.power_source.tooltip: The tag that items must have to be able to power portals (1 power per item).
config.particles_enabled.tooltip: If enabled, portals emit particles (visual effect).
config.ambient_sound_enabled.tooltip: If enabled, portals emit an ambient sound.
config.teleportation_sound_enabled.toolt: If enabled, a sound effect is played to the player after a successful teleportation.
config.missing_permission: Your are missing the required permissions for this command.
